meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snooty.
meanings.sent1: Her snootinesses was evident in the way she looked down on others.
meanings.sent2: His snootinesses made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snootinesses towards the new puppy was comical.
meanings.sent4: The snootinesses of the fashion industry can be overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The snootinesses of the queen was legendary throughout the kingdom.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of being snooty.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't stand her snootinesses towards the waitstaff.
meanings.sent2: His snootinesses was off-putting to everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: The snootinesses of the fancy restaurant staff was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her snootinesses was like a thick fog, isolating her from others.
meanings.sent5: The snootinesses of the celebrity was unmatched in Hollywood.
